dict.acceptation: 工程（学）， 工程师行业；操纵，管理；土木工程，工事；开车技术；

sent.orig: Biotechnology includes gene engineering, cell engineering, enzyme engineering, fermentation engineering, etc.
sent.trans: 生物技术包括基因工程、细胞工程、酶工程、发酵工程等。

sent.orig: Navigable hydraulics,hydraulic engineering techniques in engineering designs,engineering project evaluation and evaluation of key courses (engineering subjects).
sent.trans: 通航水力学、工程项目评估、工程设计中的水利工程技术，重点学科（工科类）评估。

sent.orig: Applicants must be majoring in physics, chemistry, material science, engineering and electric engineering and mechanical engineering.
sent.trans: 申请之学生应具备物理、化学、材料、科学、电子工程及机械工程等相关背景。

sent.orig: Majoring in Electronics Engineering, Communication Engineering, Computer Science, Mechanical Engineering or Moduling.
sent.trans: 电子工程、通信工程、计算机科学、机械工程、模具专业为佳。

sent.orig: The reliability engineering is a newly arisen engineering course, an important branch of system engineering.
sent.trans: 可靠性工程是一门新兴的工程学科，是系统工程的一个重要分支。
